bengotow commented on issue #5731: ARROW-6987: [CI] Fix Travis OSX macOS SDK install
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/5731#issuecomment-547594541
 
 
   Hey @fsaintjacques found this in google search results and spent hours today trying to fix this for https://travis-ci.org/Foundry376/Mailspring. So far the only solution I've found is to downgrade to `xcode10.1` on Travis (which uses 10.13 and not 10.14 Mojave). Thankfully I was upgrading to get `altool` and notarize the app, and it appears that version included it.
